TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataSource

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件绑定到的抽象数据源。

span.span: Represents an abstract data source that data-bound controls bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持控件数据绑定体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件，用于绑定到数据以一致的方式。ASP.NET supports a control data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion. Web 服务器控件绑定到数据的数据绑定控件，并促进绑定称为数据源控件的类称为。Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 数据源控件可以表示任何数据源： 关系数据库、 文件、 流、 业务对象等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a relational database, a file, a stream, a business object, and so on. 数据源控件以数据绑定控件，而不考虑源或基础数据的格式一致的方式显示数据。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 你实现接口时想要实现您自己自定义的 ASP.NET 数据源控件。You implement the interface when you want to implement your own custom ASP.NET data source control. 实现任何类接口是一个数据源控件。Any class that implements the interface is a data source control. 接口作为所有 ASP.NET 数据源的基础控件，并具有其两个方法定义的基本数据绑定体系结构概念之一：方法和方法。The interface serves as the foundation for all ASP.NET data source controls and defines one of the fundamental data-binding architecture concepts with its two methods: the method and the method. 此概念是所有数据源控件都支持对其数据的一个或多个命名的视图。This concept is that all data source controls support one or more named views on their data. 数据源视图对象是类似于中的抽象命名空间： 数据可绑定的自定义视图的数据的排序、 筛选和该视图定义其他数据操作。The data source view object is similar to the abstraction in the namespace: a data-bindable, customized view of data for sorting, filtering, and other data operations that the view defines. 就其核心而言，数据源控件不执行任何操作超过检索数据的视图。At its core, a data source control does nothing more than retrieve views on data. 数据源控件可以具有一个或多个关联的数据源视图对象。A data source control can have one or more associated data source view objects. 某些数据源控件，包括表示关系数据库，如和，只支持一个视图。Some data source controls, including those that represent relational databases such as and , support only one view. 其他数据源控件，其中包括分层数据源控件，例如，支持多个视图。Other data source controls, including hierarchical data source controls such as , support many views. 数据源视图定义数据源以及它支持的操作的功能。The data source view defines the capabilities of a data source and the operations that it supports. 总之，数据源控件实现接口、 支持一个或多个命名它们表示，并始终支持从它们表示的数据源检索数据的数据的视图。In summary, data source controls implement the interface, support one or more named views on the data they represent, and always support data retrieval from the data source they represent. 数据源控件始终根据需要检索数据，例如，当`DataBind`调用数据绑定控件上。Data source controls always retrieve data on demand, such as when `DataBind` is called on a data bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个类可以实现由定义的方法接口，以提供数据绑定控件的数据。The following code example demonstrates how a class can implement the methods defined by the interface to provide data to data-bound controls. 在此示例中的数据源控件充当数据源上的逗号分隔值文件，和任何数据绑定控件可以用于显示以逗号分隔文件数据。The data source control in this example acts as a data source on a comma-separated value file, and can be used by any data-bound control to display comma-separated file data. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#1)]

summary.span: 数据源控件以某种影响数据绑定控件的方式发生变化时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a data source control has changed in some way that affects data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时的数据绑定控件或基础数据的属性已更改以某种方式影响的数据绑定控件和其数据之间的数据绑定。The event is raised when the properties of a data-bound control or the underlying data has changed in some way that affects the data bindings between a data-bound control and its data. 例如，将引发事件，如果文件 name 属性，如属性，更改对基于文件的数据源控件。For example, the event is raised if a file name property, such as the property, is changed on a file-based data source control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.DataSourceView GetView(string viewName) cil managed
Public Function GetView (viewName As String) As DataSourceView

span.span: The name of the view to retrieve.

summary.span: 获取与数据源控件关联的指定数据源视图。

span.span: Gets the named data source view associated with the data source control.

returns.span: 返回与 关联的指定 。

span.span: Returns the named associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源控件类可以支持其基础数据的一个或多个视图。Data source control classes can support one or more views on their underlying data. 这些视图由的实例表示类。These views are represented by instances of the class. 数据源视图定义的数据源控件，功能，并执行从基础数据存储区检索数据和执行操作，例如排序、 插入、 删除和更新所需的所有工作。The data source view defines the capabilities of a data source control, and performs all the work necessary to retrieve data from the underlying data store and perform operations such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating. 数据源控件的类，该实现接口实现方法以返回强类型查看与类关联的对象。Data source control classes that implement the interface implement the method to return strongly typed view objects associated with the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现的数据源控件类接口实现方法，返回的强类型的实例类。The following code example demonstrates how a data source control class that implements the interface implements the method, returning a strongly typed instance of the class. 由于数据源控件支持只有一个视图，它会忽略名，并返回以默认视图名称命名的视图。Because the data source control supports only one view, it ignores the name and returns a view named with the default view name. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection GetViewNames() cil managed

summary.span: 获取名称的集合，表示与 接口关联的视图对象的列表。

span.span: Gets a collection of names representing the list of view objects associated with the interface.

returns.span: 包含视图名称的 ，这些视图与 关联。

span.span: An that contains the names of the views associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源控件类可以支持其基础数据的一个或多个命名的视图。Data source control classes can support one or more named views on their underlying data. 方法返回当前与数据源控件实例关联的视图名称的集合。The method returns a collection of view names currently associated with the data source control instance. 调用方可以循环访问集合的视图名称并检索各个对象与方法。Callers can iterate through the collection of view names and retrieve individual objects with the method. 数据源控件的类，该实现接口实现方法来返回表示所有数据源的名称集合查看当前与数据源控件类关联的对象。Data source control classes that implement the interface implement the method to return a collection of names that represents all the data source view objects currently associated with the data source control class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个数据源控件接口实现方法，从而返回的名称的集合。The following code example demonstrates how a data source control that implements the interface implements the method, returning an collection of names. 由于数据源支持只有一个视图，该方法将返回使用视图的默认名称的一个元素的集合。Because the data source supports only one view, the method returns a collection of one element using the default name for the view. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#4)]
